title: Works great
comment: Early days but works well. It modifies the APN details in effect disabling the data entry with a nonsense APN in order to get around android security restrictions. There are several other Data switch products which claim that this is not the best way to turn on/off a data connection and that doing so this way may corrupt the data ... but it seems to work fine for me without corruption, and more importantly none of the "better" widgets work (for me). I have an HTC Wildfire/ADW Launcher/HTC Sense killed
